title: Analysis: The two legacies of Colin Powell
description: There are two important ways to consider Colin Powell upon his death from complications of Covid-19 despite being fully vaccinated.

title: Man catches shark weighing in at over 500 pounds
description: Man catches 13-foot hammerhead shark off the coast of North Carolina. CNN affiliate WSOC reports.

title: Inside a Chinese Christmas tree factory ... and why they could take longer to get to you this year
description: CNN's David Culver follows the supply chain from a factory in southern China to a wholesaler in New Jersey, where the National Tree Company's CEO is warning that consumers will have to dish out more for an artificial Christmas tree this year.

title: Reactions pouring in after Powell's death
Greta Thunberg 'Rickrolls' climate concert with crazy dance moves
description: Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg has "Rickrolled" an audience, all in the name of climate activism.

title: As first Black US secretary of state, he helped shape US foreign policy in several GOP administrations
Colin Powell, military leader and first Black US secretary of state, dies from Covid
Channing Tatum weighs in on Dave Chappelle controversy
description: Channing Tatum has addressed Dave Chappelle's controversial remarks about the trans community.

title: The Black vote is key in Virginia election. See how Kamala Harris is getting involved
description: Vice President Kamala Harris shared a video where she urged Democratic voters to back Virginia gubernatorial candidate Terry McAuliffe, who is running against Republican Glenn Youngkin. One of McAuliffe campaign's most pressing concerns in the closing days before the election is apathy and fatigue among Democratic supporters. CNN's Eva McKend reports.

title: Goldman Sachs looks forward to a 'new chapter' in China
description: Goldman Sachs has received clearance to take full ownership of its securities joint venture in China, a sign that Beijing remains open to foreign financial firms even as geopolitical tensions simmer.

title: Tornado-like waterspout caught on camera
description: The weather event occurred in the southern side of Cuba on October 16.

title: Murder suspect dies after a week on the run
description: A murder suspect who garnered widespread sympathy from the Chinese public has died after more than a week on the run, triggering an outpouring of sadness and outrage on social media.

title: Kourtney Kardashian and Travis Barker are engaged
description: Kourtney Kardashian has confirmed her engagement to Travis Barker with a romantic post on Instagram.

title: This could make bitcoin bigger than ever
description: This year, cryptocurrencies have been up. They've been down. But they never seem to be entirely out.

title: Māori All Blacks player Sean Wainui, 25, dies after car crash
description: New Zealand Rugby is mourning the death of Māori All Blacks player Sean Wainui after the 25-year-old died in a car accident on Monday.

title: Facebook to hire 10,000 people in EU to build the 'metaverse'
description: Facebook plans to hire up to 10,000 workers in Europe to build a "metaverse" that will combine virtual and augmented reality technologies in a new online realm.

title: At least 22 people killed after torrential rain in India's Kerala state triggers landslides and floods
description: At least 22 people have been killed and two remain missing after heavy rain triggered floods and landslides in southern India.

title: Beijing 2022: Protesters arrested in Athens over Winter Olympics
description: Greek police detained three protestors on Sunday after they unfurled a banner opposing the Beijing 2022 Winter Olympics, as China prepared to receive the Olympic flame.

title: How to best burn calories while walking
description: It's no secret that walking is good for you. Many of us are trying to get in those recommended 10,000 steps a day that our wearable fitness technology urges us to achieve.

title: CNN's Wolf Blitzer reflects on the passing of General Colin Powell
description: CNN's Wolf Blitzer reflects on the death of Colin Powell, the first Black US secretary of state whose leadership in several Republican administrations helped shape American foreign policy in the last years of the 20th century.

title: Singapore Airlines to fly A380 on 60-minute flight
description: The Airbus A380 is designed for long-haul flying, thanks to its hefty size and famously quiet inflight experience.

title: Powerful gang behind kidnapping of 17 US and Canadian missionaries in Haiti, security source says
description: One of Haiti's most powerful gangs is believed to be behind the kidnapping of 17 American and Canadian missionaries, a source in the Caribbean country's security forces told CNN Sunday.

title: Ex-intel official who created controversial Trump Russia dossier speaks out
description: Former British intelligence officer Christopher Steele, the man behind the "Steele Dossier" that claimed Russian officials held compromising information on former President Donald Trump, defended the claims made in the dossier in his first on-camera interview since it was revealed in 2017.

title: China denies testing a nuclear-capable hypersonic missile, says it was a spacecraft
description: China has denied a report that it tested a nuclear-capable hypersonic missile in August, saying on Monday that the test was instead a "routine spacecraft experiment."

title: 'Please get vaccinated.' Daughter's death after giving birth a cautionary tale, mom says
description: Marrisha Kindred Jenkins was 33 weeks pregnant when she started complaining of a persistent cough and vomiting last month.

title: Australian police search for 4-year-old girl missing from tent on camping trip
description: Police are searching for a 4-year-old girl who went missing from a campsite in Western Australia on Saturday.

title: Britain has a new tennis star: Meet Cameron Norrie
description: It's been quite the few months for British tennis -- you've met Emma Raducanu, now get ready for Cameron Norrie.

title: Workers injured in Kuwait refinery fire, output unaffected
description: A fire at Kuwait's Mina al-Ahmadi oil refinery on Monday injured several workers but operations were unaffected, Kuwait National Petroleum Company (KNPC) said.

title: What are carbon offsets and do they work?
description: Companies and people who want to cancel out the impact of their emissions on the climate often turn to something called carbon offsetting.

title: FIFA fears recent abuse cases in women's football are just 'tip of the iceberg'
description: After allegations of abuse in women's football surfaced in recent weeks in the US, Venezuela and Australia, the sport's world governing body FIFA fears they could be the "tip of the iceberg."

title: Australian golfer makes hole-in-one just shy of 100th birthday
description: Traditional golfing etiquette calls for waiting for the group in front of you to vacate the green before hitting your drive on a par-3 hole.

title: Large-scale nude photos highlight disappearing Dead Sea
description: With desert peaks stabbing the sky and a thin blue ribbon of Dead Sea shimmering in the distance, the ghostly figures of around 200 men and women -- painted head to toe in white -- began appearing from behind an outcrop.

title: The hotel on the rooftop of Arabia
description: "Don't worry, it'll be a walk in the park," says Ali, the senior climbing instructor at Alila Jabal Akhdar, a luxury hotel in the mountains of Oman.

title: Lauded female crime writer revealed to be three men
description: Spain's literary world has been thrown into chaos after a coveted book prize was awarded to "Carmen Mola" -- an acclaimed female thriller writer who turned out to be the pseudonym of three men.

title: Why some are dubbing this milk 'white gold'
description: While tea may be Kenya's largest export, a new beverage is brewing in central Nairobi: cappuccinos made with a splash of camel's milk.

title: 'It's going to be within our capability' to prevent another coronavirus surge, Fauci says
description: The optimistic turn in Covid-19 cases, hospitalizations and deaths could end in another spike in infections, Dr. Anthony Fauci said Sunday. But the US could still prevent that spike with higher vaccination rates.

title: Rising prices and empty store shelves spell danger for Biden and Democrats
description: Joe Biden's struggle to make America normal again after the pandemic is proving to be far more protracted and complicated than first thought, which has enormous political implications for the President and his party.

title: When your home becomes a tourist magnet
description: Have you ever looked at a beautiful little mews house in London and thought "it must be so amazing to live there?"
